articles.title: Cows in Texas and Kansas test positive for highly pathogenic bird flu - Ars Technica

Wild migratory birds likely spread a deadly strain of bird flu to dairy cows in Texas and Kansas, state and federal officials announced this week.

articles.title: Bharat Biotech commenced clinical trial of MTBVAC vaccine in India - PSU Connect
articles.description:
Bharat Biotech International Ltd said it started clinical trials of the Tuberculosis vaccine MTBVAC on adults in India. This is the first vaccine against Tuberculosis derived from a human source by the Spanish bio-pharmaceutical company, Biofabri.
